GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.18 to before v4.9.318
GSD.description:
media: pvrusb2: fix array-index-out-of-bounds in pvr2_i2c_core_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit 4351bfe36aba9fa7dc9d68d498d25d41a0f45e67, it was introduced in version v2.6.18 by commit d855497edbfbf9e19a17f4a1154bca69cb4bd9ba. For more details please see the references link.
